title: Joseph Merrick
summary: Joseph Carey Merrick (5 August 1862 â€“ 11 April 1890), often erroneously called John Merrick, was an English man known for having severe deformities. He was first exhibited at a freak show as the "Elephant Man", and then went to live at the London Hospital after he met Sir Frederick Treves, subsequently becoming well known in London society.
